snippet: A French regulatory agency said Microsoft’s Skype unit had failed to register as a telecommunications operator as required by law.
abstract: French regulators are initiating inquiry into Microsoft's Skype unit over its failure to register as telecommunications operator in accordance with local law, raising question of what constitutes telephone company in Internet age.
lead_paragraph: A French regulatory agency said Microsoft’s Skype unit had failed to register as a telecommunications operator as required by law.

headline.main: Is Skype a Telephone Operator? France Will Investigate
headline.print_headline: French Regulators Seek Inquiry Into Skype
